comments:
Exception when running the GLA editor on newly created rules/log files.

A new GLA rules file (see enclosed) was created for the enclosed log file, the 
start pattern was changed and the creationTime rule was created.  Once the 
newly created GLA rules file was ran using the GLA editor, the following 
exception was thrown in the .log file:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: 
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:56)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:41)

(Compiled Code))

le(AcadGuiModel.java:124)

Note, sometimes the GLA editor will not run (nor throw the exception) the 
adapter file despite it being correct.

I think this is a runtime problem; the Adapter throws an exception, and the 
exception message is null
Please ssign to the runtime component if this is the case; a small fix on the 
UI would be to check if the exc.getMessage() is null, and is this case to show 
an unknown error dialog
